full_summary:
# Construct Building H-102 Communication and Information Technology Building

## Tender Notice

### Reference Number
MX-22612654510

### Solicitation Number
PA061752_79072

### Tender Closing Date
2022-12-13T14:00:00

### Expected Contract Start Date
2023-01-03

### Expected Contract End Date
2023-01-03

**Information**

The Canadian Department of National Defence's Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites contractors to submit bids for the construction of a new single-storey building (Building H-102) to house communications and information technology in Petawawa, Ontario. The site will comprise a 1,175 m2 facility with cross-laminated timber structure for the exterior walls and roof.

**Project Description**

The project includes, but is not limited to:

* Supply of labour, material, supervision, and equipment
* Construction of a building with parking and fire access
* Installation of a diesel-fired emergency generator and mechanical and electrical site servicing

**Security Requirements**

The selected contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance (FSC) with SECRET clearance and approved Document Safeguarding at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Tender Documents**

The Plans and Specifications (P&S) for this opportunity are available for ordering from MERX. Bidders are responsible for obtaining any amendments to the tender documents.

**Site Visit**

A site visit has been arranged for November 17, 2022. Bidders are highly recommended to attend.

**Estimated Cost**

The estimated cost for this opportunity is in the range of $13,400,000.00.

**Payment Schedule**

The Work must reach Substantial Completion no later than 609 calendar days after notification of contract award and must be completed no later than 42 calendar days after the date of Substantial Completion.

**Dispute Resolution**

Inquiries relating to this solicitation are to be directed EXCLUSIVELY to DCC's contracting authority.

**Contact Information**

DCC Contracting Authority:

Phone: 613-312-0224
Email: [PCO@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:PCO@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**

https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334568678/abstract?language=EN\
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334568678/abstract?
